dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Greetings, and welcome to Monarch Stellar Industries, producers and purveyors of the finest saltuna in Halcyon.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: What can I do for you today?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Grimm asked me to check with you about his tossball poster.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: You know, sending you is the first bright idea I've seen from that man. Because I told him to stop bothering me about it a week ago.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: I still don't know anything about it. But if you want to help him, Velma's the one to ask. She's in the warehouse.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: But I'll warn you, Grimm wore her patience thin a long time ago.
